title: Bug 102623: Image not refreshing after re-importing
OB: When an image is re-imported into the layout, the original image remains displayed instead of the new one.
EB: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: Import a new image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout. Expected result: The new image should be displayed. Actual result: The original image is still displayed.
SR:
1. Open the layout
2. Import the new image 'image1.jpg'
3. Verify that the new image is not displayed, but the original image is still visible.
